alert.note: Alert for Pueblo (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 13 at 7:48AM MDT until June 14 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Pueblo CO has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Colorado... Arkansas River Near Nepesta affecting Pueblo County. .Heavy rains will cause water levels to rise along the Arkansas River at Nepesta. For the Lower Arkansas River...including Nepesta...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Arkansas River Near Nepesta. * WHEN...From this evening to tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 16.5 feet, Minor Flood. Agricultural lands near Nepesta are flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 AM MDT Tuesday the stage was 15.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 16.5 feet this evening. - Flood stage is 16.5 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 16.6 feet on 05/21/2015. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 745 PM MDT.
